paragraf1: Since 1984, Öden Gıda San. Tic. Ltd. Şti., has been adding flavor to your tables by always prioritizing quality in the agricultural sector. From the first day, our company has been producing without compromising on the principle of naturalness and reliability. In 1994, with a wider range of products under the name Aybak Gıda San. Tic. Ltd. Şti., we began offering various legumes products in addition to rice. On this journey from the field to your table, you will find the same care and quality in each of our products.
misyon: Our products, selected from the most distinguished regions, are offered to our customers, and the same quality of products is sold throughout the year. While carrying out its activities to provide quality flavors to your table, AYBAK has also highlighted quality in its commercial activities by obtaining ISO 9001:2000 certifications under the Öden Gıda San. and Tic. Ltd. Şti. umbrella.
vizyon: Our vision is to become a leading and reliable brand in the agricultural products wholesale sector. We continuously renew ourselves to use technology and innovative methods to improve our logistics and supply chain continuously, gain a competitive position in the global market, and provide superior service to our customers. We aim to contribute to the future with environmentally friendly and sustainable business models.
company_info: Our company was founded in 1984 as Öden Gıda San. Tic. Ltd. Ltd. It started its activities under the name and became a leading company in rice planting and production. In 1994, Aybak Gıda San. Tic. Ltd. Ltd. In addition to rice, it has also added other legume products to its range.
quality_policy: Our company, which determines quality, trust and stability as its road map, aims to take its stable line further every day.
rice_facilities: It offers better and higher quality service to its customers with its rice and oil integrated facilities, directly planted paddy and sunflower fields, and state-of-the-art machinery and equipment.
products_and_services: Continuing its activities with rice and pulse varieties, Ödenay sunflower oils, Ödenay corn oils and local products, Aybak serves its customers in the fastest and most reliable way with its strong logistics.
unchanging_quality: Continuing its activities with rice and pulse varieties, Ödenay sunflower oils, Ödenay corn oils and local products, Aybak serves its customers in the fastest and most reliable way with its strong logistics.
aybak_brand: Our company, which markets our products with the registered trademarks Aybak and Akbak and moves towards branding, has kept its targets high.
unique_flavor: We aim to make our customers feel different with our Ödenay oils. Our company, which identifies its name primarily with quality and trust, is taking stronger, more confident steps towards the future with its R&D studies.
mission_text: Our products, selected from the most exclusive regions of the region, are offered to our customers and the same quality products are sold and service is provided all year round.
mission_text2: While AYBAK carries out its activities to bring quality tastes to your table, Öden Gıda San. and Tic. Ltd. Ltd. It has brought quality to the forefront in its commercial activities by obtaining ISO 9001: 2000 certificates.
vision_text: Our vision is to become a leading and reliable brand in the agricultural products wholesale industry. We constantly renew ourselves to constantly improve our logistics and supply chain by using technology and innovative methods, to achieve a competitive position in the global market and to provide superior service to our customers. We aim to contribute to the future with environmentally friendly and sustainable business models.
belge-title: Aybak Gıda San. Tic. Ltd. Ltd. aspect,
belge-text: We are proud to share our documents with you as an indication of the importance we attach to quality and reliability. We are constantly improving our production and distribution processes with our documents and certificates in order to maintain our position in the sector for many years and to provide the best service to our customers. We continue our work non-stop to offer the highest quality and reliable products to our valued customers.
importance_of_legumes: The importance of legumes for our health
legumes_description: Legumes are indispensable parts of a healthy diet and offer many benefits. First of all, legumes are extremely rich in protein, fiber, vitamins and minerals. It is especially high in B vitamins and minerals such as iron, magnesium and zinc. These nutrients support overall health and energy levels. Legumes, which are a great source of protein especially for vegetarians and vegans, provide essential amino acids necessary for muscle development and repair. It is a perfect alternative for those who do not consume meat.
legumes_description2: Legumes help the digestive system function healthily with their high fiber content. Regular consumption of legumes prevents digestive problems such as constipation and supports intestinal health. Additionally, the low fat and high fiber content of legumes may help lower cholesterol levels. The antioxidants and healthy fats they contain protect heart health and reduce the risk of heart disease. Legumes, which have a low glycemic index, keep blood sugar balanced and reduce insulin resistance. It plays an important role in reducing the risk of diabetes and is useful in the management of existing diabetes. Legumes, which are rich in fiber and protein, increase the feeling of fullness and reduce the tendency to overeat.
form-text: You can contact us by filling out the form below. We will get back to you as soon as possible.
yemekTariflerih2: Delicious Dishes You Can Make with Aybak Products
yemekTariflerip: As Aybak  Gıda, we add flavor to your tables with our high-quality and nutritious products. The dishes you can prepare with our products offer both healthy and practical recipes, enriching your daily diet. Here are some delicious meal suggestions you can make with Aybak products.
